title: Enhancing Programming Practical Skills: Food Animal Production Education Design Using Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic agricultural concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five fundamental stages of food animal production: feed management, disease prevention, breeding management, environmental conditioning, and distribution processes.
Learners can analyze and evaluate feed formulation optimization processes through multimedia simulations.
Learners can present case studies of animal welfare standards applied in a 3D virtual farm environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
